channel.title: Help how do i let 2 people on?!?!? help
channel.description: ok on my server it only lets 1 person get on from the ip address how do i set it too let 2 people get on?

item.title: Help how do i let 2 people on?!?!? help
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

Oh yea, so you cant have more then one connection per IP address.

Now, i’m guessing the IP Address’s/Host names are stored in a Map, so we would have to find the if statement that checks if a IP Address/Host name is in that Map.

Find the String that is displayed and then paste the code around that String here. I’ll take a look at it

Read full topic

item.title: Help how do i let 2 people on?!?!? help
item.dc:creator: @heroisgay heroisgay
item.description:
@heroisgay wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:6, topic:240453”]Oh, fair play.

Shouldn’t two people be able too login from the same address? What happens when you try and log in from the same address?[/quote]

It most likely gives a message: Too many connections from this address.
